# The `location_op_iterator` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Iterator for <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/valueasmetadata">ValueAsMetadata</a> that internally uses direct pointer iteration over either a ValueAsMetadata&#42; or a ValueAsMetadata&#42;&#42;, dereferencing to the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/valueasmetadata">ValueAsMetadata</a> . <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Iterator for <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/valueasmetadata">ValueAsMetadata</a> that internally uses direct pointer iteration over either a ValueAsMetadata&#42; or a ValueAsMetadata&#42;&#42;, dereferencing to the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/valueasmetadata">ValueAsMetadata</a> .
